revised_title: Observations of a Fireball Explosion at Sea
tldr: A fireball was observed at sea, causing significant damage to a ship. The fireball exploded near the ship, shattering the main topmast and damaging the mainmast. The explosion also knocked down five men and burned one of them. The event was reported by Mr. Chalmers, who was on board the Montague under Admiral Chambers' command.
